paragraphs.body: Super Brawl World is an online crossover game that is hosted on Nick.com, in which different characters from various ${link_0} cartoons can be played as brawlers.
paragraphs.text: Super Brawl World is an online crossover game that is hosted on Nick.com, in which different characters from various Nickelodeon cartoons can be played as brawlers.

paragraphs.body: The objective of the game is to battle and defeat the enemies your chosen character has been pitted against. All the characters have the same standard moves, though they each have a special attack. Before playing, each player needs to choose another character they can ask for help via the "brawl call".
paragraphs.text: The objective of the game is to battle and defeat the enemies your chosen character has been pitted against. All the characters have the same standard moves, though they each have a special attack. Before playing, each player needs to choose another character they can ask for help via the "brawl call".

paragraphs.body: When called upon via the brawl call, ${link_0} enters the ${link_1}, surrounds herself with the four elements, and invokes a meteor shower.
paragraphs.text: When called upon via the brawl call, Korra enters the Avatar State, surrounds herself with the four elements, and invokes a meteor shower.

paragraphs.body: The special attack can only be used when there is power in the yellow meter underneath the bar indicating the character's health; the more build-up there is, the more powerful the attack. The power in this meter can be gathered by both taking and dealing out blows. When charged completely, the brawl call can be used. Each character invoked via the brawl call has their own attack.
paragraphs.text: The special attack can only be used when there is power in the yellow meter underneath the bar indicating the character's health; the more build-up there is, the more powerful the attack. The power in this meter can be gathered by both taking and dealing out blows. When charged completely, the brawl call can be used. Each character invoked via the brawl call has their own attack.

paragraphs.body: While ${link_0} is not a playable character, she can be called upon with the brawl call. When she enters the battlefield, Korra enters the ${link_1} and showers the field with comets in an attempt to hit the player's opponent.
paragraphs.text: While Korra is not a playable character, she can be called upon with the brawl call. When she enters the battlefield, Korra enters the Avatar State and showers the field with comets in an attempt to hit the player's opponent.
